name: Hot Mom
description: Hot Mom is meme token on solana, build with community. I cook, I clean, I crash charts in heels. They call me Hot Mom for a reason. I’m the reason your feed’s sweating. I’m not just a snack—I’m the full-course fantasy. One wink and trends flip. One step and heads turn. Keep up if you can, baby. But don’t burn yourself.. It’s not just me—there’s a whole crew. Slide into Telegram where it’s moms, memes, and mayhem. We’re chatting, laughing, dropping heat, and keeping it flirty 24/7. If you’re into bold energy and hotter takes, this is your new favorite place. Come say hi. We might adopt you.
